themes.description: Covers overall positive or neutral comments about the app or platform that do not fit into specific problem categories.
This theme covers requests or feedback related to existing or new features, data availability, and analytical tools within the application.
This theme covers allegations of fraud, scam, unauthorized activity, data breaches, or other security-related issues and trust concerns.
Requests for new features, enhancements, or changes to existing functionality within the application.
Issues related to the overall trading functionality, usability for specific trading strategies, and advanced trading features.
This theme covers problems related to account activation, deactivation, login, verification, and general access issues.
Concerns regarding personal data collection, usage, and privacy practices, including document submission.
Requests for new features, services, or enhancements to existing functionalities.
This theme covers complaints and suggestions related to the application's design, layout, navigation, and overall user experience.
Covers issues related to updating personal details, KYC, or managing account settings.
Covers requests or issues related to specific trading functionalities, order types, or investment options.
Concerns about the app's legitimacy, security, or accusations of fraudulent practices and holding funds.
Requests for account statements, trading history, tax documents, or other personal account-related details.
Positive feedback or compliments about the app's overall quality, ease of use, or specific features without specific issues.
This theme covers feedback related to the app's design, usability, navigation, and overall user interface, including ease of use and intuitiveness.
This theme covers reviews discussing the perceived value of the service in relation to fees, comparing features with competitors, or expressing dissatisfaction with the overall offering.
This theme covers feedback related to promotional campaigns, special offers, loyalty programs, and incentives for customers.
Issues or suggestions regarding the display, organization, and management of investment portfolios and returns.
Issues or requests related to the application's compatibility, display, or performance on specific devices or operating systems.
Suggestions or requests for new investment products, services, or features to be added to the platform.
Feedback and suggestions related to the application's user interface, visual design, and overall aesthetic.
Feedback regarding the availability or absence of specific financial products, instruments, or services within the platform.
Problems related to the receipt, calculation, or distribution of dividends from investments.
This theme covers issues related to the accuracy, availability, or quality of information provided within the application.
This theme covers concerns related to the company's trustworthiness, ethical practices, potential fraud, and overall reliability.
Problems related to Know Your Customer (KYC) verification, status, renewal, or restrictions due to incomplete KYC.
Feedback or requests regarding general application features, missing information display, or user interface functionalities beyond core trading tools.
